message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. Consider the decreasing value of the money - a deal now is better than a potentially worse deal later.

Alice, your offer was tempting, but ultimately unfair. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.  This accounts for the decreasing value of the money while still offering you a reasonable share. Let's close this deal now.

Bob, it seems we're at an impasse. Let's be practical. I'm offering a 50/50 split. This ensures we both benefit before inflation erodes the value further. A fair deal is better than a drawn-out negotiation.
